betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Given the danger that Warp represents you'd like have a safe space for it. Some place you can quickly escape to where Warp cannot reach you, give you an opportunity to fall back and regroup.

The Thaumic Sauna Stove, while probably not intended for such extreme measures, does the trick. Fed water (either manually or piped in) it will create a pleasant cloud of steam which gives you a Warp Ward buff while you are within range.

One downside is that you will burn through satutation quickly staying within the steam, but that is nothing a Healing Axe can't resolve. Or a Fames injection, if keeping an axe in your hand would prove inconcenient.
